sentences.en: “the much used leveraged buyout as the weapon of choice”(&b{Alison Leigh Cowan})
sentences.cn: “把举债经营、全部收买的老办法当作特别武器”(&b{艾利森·利·考恩})

sentences.en: Although he was only grumbling, his choice of words made Rodney angry.
sentences.cn: 尽管他只是在咕哝，可是他的措词却让罗德妮恼火。

sentences.en: At lunchtime, there's a choice between the buffet or the set menu.
sentences.cn: 午餐可以吃自助餐，也可以选套餐。

sentences.en: choice steak
sentences.cn: 上等牛排

sentences.en: He has to make some important choices.
sentences.cn: 他得作出一些重要的抉择。

sentences.en: Helen's choice of lipstick was a good match for her skin-tone.
sentences.cn: 海伦选择的唇膏很适合她的肤色。

sentences.en: Here are a few pointers to help you make a choice.
sentences.cn: 这儿有几条帮助作出选择的建议。

sentences.en: I think London was a good choice as a venue.
sentences.cn: 我觉得伦敦是个很好的选址。

sentences.en: It's a straight choice between low-paid jobs and no jobs.
sentences.cn: 只有两个选择：要么是报酬很低的工作，要么就是失业。

sentences.en: Many firms have had little choice but to slim down.
sentences.cn: 许多公司几乎别无选择，只能裁员。

sentences.en: She is in the fortunate position of having plenty of choice.
sentences.cn: 好在她有很多选择。

sentences.en: She'd made the right choice in leaving New York.
sentences.cn: 她离开纽约的决定是正确的。

sentences.en: The choice will be between a flat-rate or a banded charge.
sentences.cn: 将在统一费用和分级费用之间作出选择。

sentences.en: the college of her choice.
sentences.cn: 她自己选中的大学。

sentences.en: The truth of the matter is that we had no other choice.
sentences.cn: 实情就是我们别无选择。

sentences.en: The wrong choice of club might limit your chances of success.
sentences.cn: 选错俱乐部也许会限制你成功的机会。

sentences.en: They gave us no choice in the matter.
sentences.cn: 在这件事情上他们没给我们选择的余地。

sentences.en: They had little choice but to agree to what he suggested.
sentences.cn: 他们别无选择，只好接受他的提议。

sentences.en: This new information does throw doubt on their choice.
sentences.cn: 这个新信息确实使人们对他们的选择产生了怀疑。

sentences.en: Today's special offer gives you a choice of three destinations.
sentences.cn: 今天推出的特价线路有3个目的地可供选择。

sentences.en: UK companies face a stark choice if they want to stay competitive.
sentences.cn: 英国公司如果想要保持竞争力就不得不面对严峻的选择。

sentences.en: We select only the choicest apples for our pies.
sentences.cn: 我们只挑选最好的苹果做馅饼。

phrases.tran_cn: 可供选择的品种不多，没什么可供选择的
v. 没有选择的余地；不特别偏爱哪一个
可以挑选，有选择的自由，有选择权
优先选择的：在同一类或同一组中比别的更受欢迎的

trans.tran_cn: 优选的，中上级的，字斟句酌的
trans.tran_en: (especially of food) of very good quality

trans.tran_cn: 选择（权/范围），选定的人/物
trans.tran_en: if you have a choice, you can choose between several things
